title: 太...了
topic: 外貌、身体形象、Shopping / Appearance, Body Image, Shopping

script.text: 对话一：怪老师的私信升级 (Guai Laoshi's DMs Escalate)
script.en: Dialogue 1: 怪老师's DMs escalate.
Girls' group chat.

script.zh: 怪老师又发私信了。越来越过分。
script.en: 怪老师 sent DMs again. Getting worse and worse.
[Screenshot]

script.zh: 太恶心了。他在评论我的衣服。
script.en: So disgusting. He's commenting on my clothes.
[Screenshot]

script.text: > 怪老师：清清，你的作文写得太好了。你是我教过的最有才华的学生。你有没有想过读研？我可以给你写推荐信。
script.en: > 怪老师: 清清, your essay is so well-written. You're the most talented student I've ever taught. Have you thought about grad school? I could write you a recommendation letter.
So fake. Using academics as a cover.

script.zh: 小李呢？他给你发什么了？
script.en: What about 小李? What did he send you?
He messaged me too.
Saying what?

script.zh: 说他的办公室随时open。如果我想聊天可以去找他。他泡了茶。
script.en: Said his office is always open. I can come by to chat anytime. He made tea.
"Made tea"??! That's way too much!

script.zh: ……但其实挺sweet的？他注意到我最近不太开心。
script.en: ...But it's actually kinda sweet? He noticed I haven't been happy lately.

script.zh: 小李。老师不应该给你发这种私信。
script.en: 小李. A teacher shouldn't be sending you DMs like that.

script.zh: 注意：他只给女生发。王崩和矮中没收到。
script.en: Notice: he only messages the girls. 王崩 and 矮中 didn't get any.

script.zh: ……也许是因为我们需要更多帮助？
script.en: ...Maybe it's because we need more help?
He's messed up.
You guys are overthinking it.

script.text: 对话二：Shopping——女生出去逛街 (Girls Go Shopping)
script.en: Dialogue 2: Shopping -- Girls go out.

script.zh: 我需要买新衣服。什么颜色好看？
script.en: I need new clothes. What color looks good?

script.zh: 你喜欢什么颜色就买什么颜色。
script.en: Just buy whatever color you like.
I want a color that makes my skin look lighter.

script.zh: 别给我那个表情。黑色和深蓝色显白。这是common sense。
script.en: Don't give me that look. Black and dark blue make skin look lighter. It's common sense.
You look good in anything. Don't overthink it.
Too white. Makes me look even darker.
script.sub: 拿起一件白色上衣，在镜子前比了比，放下了

script.zh: 小黑。你的皮肤没有问题。是标准有问题。
script.en: 小黑. There's nothing wrong with your skin. The standard is the problem.

script.zh: 你知道一白遮三丑吗？这不是我发明的。这是中国文化说的。
script.en: You know the saying "one shade of white hides three flaws"? I didn't make that up. Chinese culture says it.

script.zh: 中国文化说了很多东西。不是每一个都对。
script.en: Chinese culture says a lot of things. Not all of them are right.
How much is this?
280 yuan.
Do you have a bigger size?
That's already the biggest size.
This one then.

script.zh: 你买的衣服都像你爸爸的。
script.en: Everything you buy looks like your dad's.
Comfortable is all that matters.
How about this one?
script.sub: 试了一件结构感很强的blazer

script.zh: 太正式了吧。你去上班还是去上课？
script.en: Way too formal. Are you going to work or going to class?
...This is how I normally dress.

script.zh: 那就是问题所在。来。穿这个。
script.en: That's the problem. Here. Try this on.

script.text: 她递给清清一件简单的黑色T恤。清清看了一下。穿上了。看了看镜子。
script.en: She hands 清清 a simple black T-shirt. 清清 looks at it. Puts it on. Checks the mirror.
Damn. 清清. You...
...What?
You look good.
Please stop.

script.zh: 我说真的。矮中看到你这样穿会——
script.en: I'm serious. If 矮中 sees you dressed like this he'll--
I'm not wearing it for 矮中!
Then why are you blushing?
Ch 11: 了 (completed action)

script.text: 她打了又删了。= She typed then deleted.
script.en: 她打了又删了 = She typed then deleted.
Ch 11: 过 (experience)
Ch 12: 太...了
Ch 12: 跟...一样

vocab.en: "one shade of white covers three uglinesses"

grammarNotes.title: 太...了
grammarNotes.body:
太恶心了 = too disgusting
太假了 = too fake
太过分了 = too excessive
太好了 = great! (positive too!)

grammarNotes.title: 跟...一样
grammarNotes.body:
跟我穿的一样 = same as what I'm wearing
他跟矮中做一样的事 = he does the same thing as Ai Zhong
